ComicInfo.Summary:
When Joe Fitzgerald was hired to find a runaway, he never imagined that pursuing that case would take him into the afterlife, tracking the man who was also responsible for the death of the woman he loved. Having crossed into Hell, Joe at last discovers that what seemed like a simple case is in fact a plot to tear down the walls of Heaven, overthrow God, and reboot Creation...and Joe is the only man who can stop the destruction of everything.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | C.P. Smith | 1 | | B | Cover B | Tommy Lee Edwards | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: Infernal Monologues
